title: Addis Poetry Night
description: Join us for an evening of spoken word poetry featuring local Ethiopian poets. Experience the power of words in Amharic, English, and other languages. This is a free community event open to all poetry lovers.

title: Coffee Ceremony & Music
description: Experience traditional Ethiopian coffee ceremony accompanied by live traditional music. Learn about the rich coffee culture of Ethiopia while enjoying performances by local musicians.

title: Traditional Dance Workshop
description: Learn traditional Ethiopian dances from different regions. No experience necessary! This free workshop is open to everyone interested in Ethiopian culture.

title: Tech Meetup: AI in Ethiopia
description: A meetup for tech enthusiasts to discuss the current state and future of Artificial Intelligence in Ethiopia. Featuring guest speakers from the local tech scene.

title: Community Clean-Up Day
description: Join us for a community-wide effort to clean up our beloved city. Supplies and refreshments will be provided. Let's make Addis beautiful together!

title: Startup Networking Event
description: Connect with fellow entrepreneurs, investors, and mentors. A great opportunity to pitch your idea and find collaborators for your next venture.

title: Jazz Night at Fendika
description: An evening of smooth jazz featuring some of Addis's finest musicians. Relax and enjoy the vibrant atmosphere.

title: Photography Walk
description: Explore the vibrant scenes of Mercato through your lens. A guided walk for photographers of all levels to capture the heart of Addis Ababa's commerce.

title: Book Club Meetup
description: This month we're discussing 'Notes from the Hyena's Belly' by Nega Mezlekia. New members are always welcome!

title: Film Screening
description: A screening of a classic Ethiopian film, followed by a discussion with a local film critic. A must for cinema lovers.

title: Yoga in the Park
description: Start your day with a refreshing yoga session in the beautiful Unity Park. All levels welcome. Bring your own mat.

title: Street Food Festival
description: A celebration of Addis Ababa's diverse street food scene. Come hungry and sample dishes from all over the country.
